items.description: Are all staff aware of the departments' SLA.
Is there evidence of the things (another standalone item)
Are policy compliance procedures documented and followed?
Is there a process for handling policy violations?
Are staff training records maintained and up-to-date?
Is there a process for policy communication to new employees?
Are policy effectiveness reviews conducted regularly?
Is there a documented process for policy approval and authorization?
Are policy version controls maintained properly?
Is there evidence of stakeholder involvement in policy development?
Are policy implementation timelines documented and tracked?

subItems.description: Is there a documented quality management system in place?
Are quality objectives defined and measurable?
Is there evidence of continuous improvement activities?
Are quality control processes documented and followed?
Is there evidence of customer satisfaction monitoring?
Are non-conformities tracked and addressed appropriately?
Is there a process for management review of the quality system?
Are quality records maintained and accessible?

items.description: Are policy exceptions documented and properly authorized?
Is there a process for policy impact assessment?
Are policy archives maintained and accessible for reference?
Is there evidence of cross-departmental policy coordination?
